prompt.title: Develop a HelloWorld Java Class program
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal: Develop a classic Java class HelloWorld.java program that print "Hello World" in the console only

constraint-list.constraint: Develop the class in the Maven module `sandbox`
Develop the class in the package info.jab.examples

prompt.safeguards: Build the solution with Maven Only

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The solution is compiled successfully with `./mvnw clean compile -pl sandbox`
The solution only prints "Hello World" in the console
The solution is committed and pushed to the branch to create the PR
Only commit java sources only and push the changes to the branch to create the PR
